name: Cantaritos Locos
description: Cantaritos locos, is bound to become your favorite drink. Fresh orange, grapefruit and lime juice are mixed with tequila and grapefruit soda, poured over crushed ice, then topped with orange, grapefruit segments, and pineapple.
recipeIngredient: 2/3 cup Fresh grapefruit juice (made with Winter Sweetz grapefruit)
1 cup Carbonated mineral water or soda water

recipeInstructions.text: Soak the clay cups in cold water for 15 minutes before making the drink.
recipeInstructions.name: Soak the clay cups in cold water for 15 minutes before making the drink.

recipeInstructions.text: Place the chamoy and the chile powder in two separate plates. Dip the rim of the clay cup in the chamoy, and then in the plate with the chile powder.
recipeInstructions.name: Place the chamoy and the chile powder in two separate plates. Dip the rim of the clay cup in the chamoy, and then in the plate with the chile powder.

recipeInstructions.text: Combine the grapefruit juice, orange juice, lime juice, and tequila in a cocktail shaker and shake to combine. Fill the cups half way with crushed ice.
recipeInstructions.name: Combine the grapefruit juice, orange juice, lime juice, and tequila in a cocktail shaker and shake to combine. Fill the cups half way with crushed ice.

recipeInstructions.text: Pour the juice mixture into the cups and top with enough soda water to fill the cup ¾ of the way.
recipeInstructions.name: Pour the juice mixture into the cups and top with enough soda water to fill the cup ¾ of the way.

recipeInstructions.text: Top the drink with the chopped pineapple, grapefruit, and orange segments. Top with more crushed ice if necessary. Garnish with grapefruit slice and serve.
recipeInstructions.name: Top the drink with the chopped pineapple, grapefruit, and orange segments. Top with more crushed ice if necessary. Garnish with grapefruit slice and serve.

keywords: aguachile, cantaritos locos, chamoy, grapefruit, orange, tequila
